nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: Burning Seas

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: Burning Seas is the fourth story arc of Marvel Comics' series Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. Written by Charles Soule with art by Giuseppe Camuncoli, the arc comprises five issues, and is in publication from March 14, 2018 to June 13, 2018.
